summary: Surya arrives in Mumbai to revive the mafia and ends up making enemies who threaten his life.
cast: Mahesh Babu|Kajal Aggarwal|Prakash Raj|Ayesha Shiva|Sayaji Shinde|Dharmavarapu Subramanyam|Brahmaji|Raza Murad|Jahangir Khan|Bharath Reddy|Nassar|Ganesh Babu|Mahesh Balraj|Shweta Bhardwaj|Rajeev Mehta|Akash Puri|Subbaraju|Sanjay Swaroop|Shivraj Walvekar|Puri Jagannadh
title: Business Man
